SELECT I.ITEM_CODE, I.ITEM_UNIQUE_CODE, I.NAME, I.PURCHASE_PRICE, I.SELLING_PRICE, I.IMAGE_URL, I.SAFETY_STOCK, I.ACTIVE, SC.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, C.NAME AS CORRESPONDENT_NAME FROM tbl_item I INNER JOIN tbl_correspondent_item CI ON CI.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE INNER JOIN tbl_correspondent C ON CI.CORRESPONDENT_CODE = C.CORRESPONDENT_CODE INNER JOIN tbl_sub_category SC ON SC.SUB_CATEGORY_CODE = I.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE I.ITEM_CODE IS NOT NULL
AND I.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%')
AND I.ITEM_UNIQUE_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemCode}, '%')
AND SC.SUB_CATEGORY_CODE = ${categoryCode}
AND C.CORRESPONDENT_CODE = #{correspondentCode}
ORDER BY I.ITEM_UNIQUE_CODE ASC
ORDER BY I.ITEM_UNIQUE_CODE DESC
ORDER BY I.NAME ASC
ORDER BY I.NAME DESC
ORDER BY I.CREATED_AT DESC
LIMIT #{ pageSize } OFFSET #{ offset };
